entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. My name is VeloBot. How can I help you today?
I need to return something. I bought it online and it's not working properly. I'm incredibly frustrated, this is taking too long.
Hello, my name is Sarah, and I understand your frustration. I’m happy to help you with a return. Could you please provide me with your order number?
It’s 12345ABC. I want to return the VeloBand Pulse I bought.
Thank you. I see your order here for the VeloBand Pulse. I understand you'd like to return it. Can you tell me what issues you are experiencing?
The heart rate sensor is completely off. It's supposed to be a smart watch! It's saying I'm at 40 bpm while I'm running! It's useless. I bought it maybe two weeks ago.

I understand. I'm very sorry you're experiencing issues with your VeloBand Pulse. Let me check our return policy for you. Our standard return policy is 90 days from the date of purchase, so you are well within that timeframe.
90 days? Really? Because I read something about it only being 10 days, and I was getting worried. Are you sure it's 90?

Yes, absolutely. Our standard policy is 90 days. Since you are within that window, I can certainly initiate a return for you. I can provide you with a prepaid shipping label to send the VeloBand Pulse back to us.
Okay, great! That would be perfect. How long will it take to get my refund?
Once we receive the returned VeloBand Pulse, it generally takes 7-10 business days to process the refund and for it to reflect in your account.
Alright, that sounds good. So, just to be clear, I don't have to talk to a manager or anything? You're handling the return right now?

That is correct. I am handling the return for you. There is no need to speak with a manager. I've already processed the return and emailed you a prepaid shipping label. Just print it out, attach it to the package, and drop it off at your nearest shipping location. Once the VeloBand Pulse is received, the refund process will begin.
Okay, perfect. Thank you so much for your help! I really appreciate it. You've made this so much easier.
You're very welcome! Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
Thank you for choosing VeloFit. Have a great day!
